label: Orchestral Literature II
description: Study of orchestral and symphonic literature from about 1850 to the present. May be repeated up to 6 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate orchestral conducting majors only; consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated up to 6 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate orchestral conducting majors only; consent of instructor.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
